message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you, and I'm happy to discuss a price that works for both of us. To start, I propose a price of $1,300,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm confident in the value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,250,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $1,225,000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise.
